goals__remit:
Rud Pedersen Public Affairs Company is a consultancy firm specialising in political advisory, analysis and strategic counseling.  
Rud Pedersen is situated in Bruxelles, Norway, Sweden, Finland and Denmark.
relevant_communication: We work with a broad range of policy areas including (but not exclusively) Financial services, taxation, Energy, Chemicals, Fast-Moving Consumer Goods, Health-Care, Defence, Tech and Food safety.
